channel.description: Recent content in Hospitals on Joe Kaufeld

item.title: Empathy and Trauma, Part Two
item.description: In volunteering at a children’s hospital, the worst thing is not knowing what happens to the people you meet.

item.title: Empathy and Trauma
item.description: In volunteering at a children’s hospital, there are lots of things I’ve never thought about before. These are some of them.
